channel.title: Mining
channel.description: How would i make mining work on a clean delta rite now i can mine with anything or i can mine with nothing in my hand also it doesnt give me ore and it doesnt say you managed to mine some ore and it doesnt say like you need a pickaxe to mine but yet i have all the codes in rite

item.title: Mining
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

ok what your wanna do is go into your client folder and search something like

set.globalobject

there add the rock at the cords u want
then in client class u need to set limitations on that object
need pickaxe in inv

then in client class u gotta go to where the crafting methods are
grab on that on that needs itens in inv and u put them together then it deletes item and adds one to inv

i will get classes and emthods later if u really need help later ad me on msn at

m13rz@live.com

ill do it for you

Read full topic
